Science Working Groups

SWMLV science is organized into seven working groups:

  • The Solar Neighorhood
  • Variable Stars
  • Star Clusters
  • Magellanic Clouds
  • Near Field Cosmology
  • The Galactic Bulge
  • Galactic Structure and the ISM
